name: Light Punk
description: This photo was taken using the light painting technique (Light painting is a long exposure technique with moving different light sources in front of the lens. You can also highlight objects or move the camera itself). Everything was done in real time in one shot without using Photoshop. Small color correction. Used lightblade. Color flashlight.  Photograph Specifications: live composite mode. | f 9 | ISO 200 | Olympus OM-D E-M1. Olympus ED 12-40mm f/2.8 Pro Micro 4/3 1588 x 1270.
